approveProofAndReleaseFunds(bytes32).details: Approve a proof and release funds to the NGO Validator checks removed - to be handled in microservices layer

params._proofId: ID of the proof to approve

constructor.details: Constructor to initialize contract with required dependencies

params._usdtToken: Address of the USDT token contract

getAvailableFunds(uint256).details: Calculate remaining funds available for a campaign

returns._0: uint256 Remaining available funds in USDT

getFundReleaseHistory(uint256).details: Get history of fund releases for a campaign

returns._0: FundRelease[] Array of fund release records

getTotalReleasedFunds(uint256).details: Get total funds released for a campaign

returns._0: uint256 Total funds released in USDT

hasReachedFirstMilestone(uint256).details: Check if a campaign has reached its first milestone (50% funding)

returns._0: bool Whether the campaign has reached 50% funding

hasReachedFullFunding(uint256).details: Check if a campaign has reached its full funding goal

returns._0: bool Whether the campaign has reached 100% funding

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

rejectProof(bytes32,string).details: Reject a proof Validator checks removed - to be handled in microservices layer

params._proofId: ID of the proof to reject

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
